name: CLASSIC SNAKE (NAJDRA Games)
description:
You are the snake who like to eat apples so don't eat yourself it's cannibalism and apples are much more healthy.

Use arrow keys to control your snake.

You can't go in reverse!

You have three sets of difficulty:

Easy (Start with three blocks only)
Medium (Start with eight blocks)
Hard (Start with twenty one blocks)

When download game open index.html or game.htm to play it.
